import React from 'react' import LeaderboardDashboard from './leaderboardDashboard' import GameConatiner from './game' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import Wallet from './wallet' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import histroy from '../history' import {Button,Row,Col} from 'react-bootstrap' import {logoutUser} from '../actions/useraction' import PlayerLeaderboard from './playerLeaderboard' class Home extends React.Component{ render(){ return

Welcome {this.props.username}

 {/* */}
} } const mapStateToProps = (state) => { return { username : state.user.username } } export default connect(mapStateToProps,{logoutUser})(Home)
